description: Leaked footage reveals suspicious movements around Tower 9 before Halden's death, bypassing state media filters.
Circulating footage fuels speculation of interference in Halden's death, intensifying calls for investigation.
Spontaneous protests erupt in districts, with citizens demanding clarity on BCI malfunctions and Council accountability.
Repeated BCI system failures lead to chaos in public services, causing significant daily disruptions citywide.
Council meeting reports growing unrest; debates ensue over the need for military oversight to prevent further chaos.
Rumors of internal sabotage in Halden's case spread online, increasing public mistrust and calls for systemic reform.
Massive blackout strikes Stenograd, intensifying breakdown of services and escalating protest movements citywide.
Council deliberations indicate splits; Harmonists and Innovators clash with Directorate over emergency measures.
Unified protests draw thousands, demanding independent audit of BCI and Halden's death amid intensifying unrest.
